conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully renders as an isometric 3D cutaway with consistent structural depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and volume. Minor perspective jitter on some wall caps.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity in room adjacencies. Balcony/Closet area correctly positioned. Doorways and partitions align well with the source 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D layout significantly (sofas, beds, dining table). Kitchen and bathroom fixtures are present in correct locations.

visual_clarity.notes: Rendering is clean, but garbled text 'labels' on the floor detract from presentation points.

detected_errors.description: Garbled pseudo-text remnants from the floor plan appear on the 3D floor surface.
Some internal door openings are rendered as open gaps without visible frames.

summary: A highly accurate 3D transformation that faithfully replicates the complex geometry and furniture layout of the original floor plan.
